name: holey
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Something that is holey has holes in it: He had to patch his holey trainers with duct tape until he had the money to buy himself a new pair. She was wearing a pair of holey trousers that weren't really suitable for the office.
More examplesFewer examplesHe didn't want to take off his shoe because he knew he was wearing a pair of holey socks. He had an old holey jumper that he wore in his office when it got too cold. Ciabatta is an Italian bread with a crisp crust and a chewy, holey interior.
